info.title: CoinCap API
info.description:
**API Description** - CoinCap API is a cryptocurrency data source providing real-time market information and historical data for various digital currencies.

**Disclaimer** - This *OpenAPI* specification was generated with the tool *RESTSpecIT*. Even though the tool verifies as much as possible the model responses, mistakes and/or inaccuracies may be found in the generated specification. Thus, data such as the license or the e-mail of the API should still be manually verified. Moreover, invalid API parameters are often ignored in *nearly* valid requests, as RESTful APIs tend to apply the **robustness principle**. This principle states that *programs receiving messages should accept non-conformant input as long as the meaning is clear*. As the validity of such parameters is difficult to verify, some described parameters may result in false positives. Query parameters that were found but did not specify a value have their schema type set to **x-null**.

servers.description: Production Server of the CoinCap API.
